body.p: During export, you can generate a file with the untranslated segments of a document. This file can be processed by other systems, such as a machine translation system. This file format is similar to an external . The following sample contains three segments: <NTMMemoryDb> <Segment>0000000002 <Control> 000011•0•0000000000000000•English(U.S.)•German(national)••EQFANSI•DEVICE.DOC </Control> <Source>Selecting Your Rack-Mounted Devices </Source> <Target></Target> </Segment> <Segment>0000000009 <Control> 000011•0•0000000000000000•English(U.S.)•German(national)••EQFANSI•DEVICE.DOC </Control> <Source>Some items to consider are: </Source> <Target></Target> </Segment> <Segment>0000000074 <Control> 000011•0•0000000000000000•English(U.S.)•German(national)••EQFANSI•DEVICE.DOC </Control> <Source>This publication assists you in selecting a hardware configuration. </Source> <Target></Target> </Segment> </NTMMemoryDb>
